Hello,

I am having trouble with JUnit Ant Log4j integration.

I am getting=
 the following Log4j error messages on the console

Buildfile: build.xml
lo=
g4j:WARN No appenders could be found for logger (org.apache.tools.ant).
log=
4j:WARN Please initialize the log4j system properly.

when launching Ant wi=
th the following batch file (irrelevant parts omitted).

@echo off
setlocal=


set LIBPATH=3Dc:\develop\library
set CLASSPATH=3D%LIBPATH%\junit-3.8.1.ja=
r
set CLASSPATH=3D%CLASSPATH%;%LIBPATH%\log4j-1.2.8.jar
set CLASSPATH=3D%CL=
ASSPATH%;%LIBPATH%\commons-logging-1.0.2.jar

ant some_target

If I remove =
junit from the classpath then log4j gets properly initialized. That is to s=
ay 

@echo off
setlocal

set LIBPATH=3Dc:\develop\library
set CLASSPATH=3D%=
CLASSPATH%;%LIBPATH%\log4j-1.2.8.jar

commons-logging-1.0.2.jar
